description: Sometimes your vision requires the full power of the Windows desktop. Create the next great application for Windows 8 and more—and instantly find millions of potential customers in the Windows Store.
displayName: Visual Studio Express 2012 for Windows Desktop
summary: You can use Visual Studio Express 2012 for Windows Desktop to build powerful desktop apps in C#, Visual Basic, and C++. You can target client technologies such as Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), Windows Forms, and Win32.
author: Microsoft
